short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View recipe webpages in a clean, distraction-free format without ads, popups, or long stories

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify Recipes transforms cluttered recipe websites into clean, easy-to-read formats. Say goodbye to long personal stories, annoying ads, and distracting popups that often precede the actual recipe. With just one click, this extension extracts the essential information - ingredients and cooking instructions - and presents them in a distraction-free layout.

Key features: • Instant recipe extraction from popular cooking websites • Clean, ad-free presentation of ingredients and instructions • Easy-to-read format that focuses solely on the recipe • Time-saving tool that eliminates scrolling through unnecessary content

Whether you're a busy parent, a cooking enthusiast, or someone who just wants to get straight to the recipe, Simplify Recipes streamlines your cooking preparation. It respects your time and enhances your online recipe experience by providing exactly what you need - the recipe itself.

Install Simplify Recipes now and transform your online cooking experience into a hassle-free, efficient process. Cook smarter, not harder!
